search_results.title: Julie Otsuka
search_results.snippet: Julie Otsuka (born May 15, 1962) is a Japanese-American author. She is known for drawing from her personal life to write autoethnographical historical novels.

search_results.title: About
search_results.snippet: Julie Otsuka was born and raised in California. After studying art as an undergraduate at Yale University she pursued a career as a painter for several years.
